title: Chiefs are hosting a Q&A on Tuesday 16/08

replies.body:
I have a few questions:

1. What techniques are you using going into the Wild Card Qualifiers to stay calm and collected? 
2. Coming into the Grand Final against Legacy, were there any concerns about your teams ability to play to your full potential with the relatively new addition Raes? 
3. And was there a solid plan going into each game against legacy? Or was it make a plan as you progressed through the game, like when Spookz kept invading Carbons jungle, was that a plan from the start, or did he decide that after the match started? 

Anyway all the best guys going into IWCQ, hope you make it into worlds, do Oceania proud boys!!!! :)

Question for all of you guys, Im shit at LOL and want to improve in my role which is mainly jg, can you give me the best jg to win low elo games (and by low elo i mean bronze :P). 

I would also like to say that your a great Auzzie team and everyone will be watching you play SO YOU BETTER WIN! GO GET'EM!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} Peace out, CS Ninja (plz add me <3)
A question for all of you, Who do you guys Reckon is gonna be the easiest and the hardest team to beat at the IWCQ?
Have you guys ever thought about playing with fans and help teach them?

When Raes came over to the team just before the Semi's vs Dire Wolves. How was the team clicking together? Was it like an instant click and it just worked or was their a few struggles that surfaced?  P.S Hope you guys get to worlds. If Swiffer solo kills Faker once I will paint a picture of the Chiefs logo on my wall. ^_^.
When you make it to lcs and win which 5 or 6 skins would you like to see in chiefs colors! and if you could change the colors of chiefs what would it be (not blue or white)
How many hours do you play league for per day? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
why did you bully legacy like that?
Pls do good, really wanna see you all succeed and make it to worlds, then you all can lose alg
Is Raes living with you guys?Has the house settled down now?Is that BLOODY BIG SWIPS gonna stream soon!?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
How confident are you off the back of the convinicing win at opl and are you going to teach spookz to watch his profanity? :P
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Hey guys bit of a random question but do you get to pick your walk out music, and if so what was the name of the song you walked out to at the finals. :)

OK OK boys. one last question from the boy genius BlackMannBannter, i was just wondering if you guys knew where the xaioweixiao elo boosted page was, my friend nightblue3 recommended it and told me i would be apart of the boosted harambe squad. Thank you for your time (ps hamilton,new zealand are doing a allnighter on friday from 8:00pm to 7:00pm with a low cost of $13.call james at 07-netcafix for seat bookings
During the OPL grand final did EGym hear a few guys yelling "Unbench the Kench!" and thats why he played him in the 3rd game because if so it was me :P
how is it being away from your family and friends?, and what have you each had to give up being in the OCE?
Are you going to change your game style going to IWCQ from versing different regions that are in general better than OCE?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I remember the first time i saw the chiefs, pax 2014 i think. I had no idea who they were.. but i wanted to know where to get their jackets xD awks
do you think you guys have been able to adapt to the world scene/meta this year a lot better than last year?

Question for all of you:
Where did you get your gamer tags from? 
P.s I love you Spookz

I have 3 questions for CHF RAES :D
1. how did you overcome having friends like Lukeafied supress your true potential to play in OPL
2. Come to hamilton for allnighter at netcaf
3. When Raes came over to the team just before the Semi's vs Dire Wolves. How was the team clicking together?
question for raes: Come back to hamilton, lukeafied said its his shout on a allnighter and netcafix heheXD {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
This question is for raes: Do You think lukeafied is a boosted animal, Did you think cellar sqaud was op back in the day. Kappa Hamilton Pride
What do you guys usually eat in the gaming house?
Who is the loudest and most annoying person in the Gaming House
how you guys are good can you teach me some tips? and whats your main champs? mine is yasuo{{champion:157}}  :D

Do we leave questions here?
If so, which of you are the messiest eater in the Chief household
are you guys single?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
who do you think is your star player on the Chiefs team?
